page.title: 11GOLF CLUB FINHAM
page.content: Finham Golf Club is situated to the E of the Kenilworth By_pass an 18 hole course with a membership of 800.Member ship is subject to a handicap, interview, and waiting list.A joining fee is paid together with an annual membership fee.Use of the course is restricted only by weather conditions and ground repairs carried out by greenkeepers.Guests can play on payment of a green fee.The Clubhouse had to be resited due to the construction of the Kenilworth By- pass which also removed 2 holes now resited on land purchased on the E side of R.Sowe.County and national tournaments e.g,Pro-Celebrity Variety Club match of 1982 are played here. Professional golfers provide tuition for the public and members of all ages.
